refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.description: At ArtAny AI, we are committed to providing an exceptional experience for our users. We understand that circumstances may change, and you may need to request a refund. Please read our refund policy carefully before making a purchase.

refundEligibility.title: Refund Eligibility
refundEligibility.timeLimit: Refund requests must be made within 3 days of your purchase. After this period, we will be unable to process any refund requests.
refundEligibility.creditUsageDescription: If you have used more than 100 credits, regardless of the purchase date, you will no longer be eligible for a refund.

howToRequest.title: How to Request a Refund
howToRequest.description: If you meet the above eligibility criteria and wish to request a refund, please follow these steps:
howToRequest.contactUsDescription: Reach out to our support team via email at
howToRequest.provideDetailsDescription: Include your account information, order number, purchase date, and the reason for your refund request in the email.
howToRequest.submitOnTimeDescription: Ensure your refund request is submitted within 3 days of purchase.

refundProcessing.title: Refund Processing
refundProcessing.description: Once we receive your refund request, we will review it and notify you of the result as soon as possible. If approved, the refund will be processed through your original payment method.

policyChanges.title: Policy Changes
policyChanges.description: We reserve the right to update the refund policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we recommend checking regularly for the latest information.

wan-ai.title: Wan 2.1: Leading AI Video Generation Model (Wanx 2.1)|Wan AI
wan-ai.description: Wan 2.1 (Alibaba WanX AI) an AI creative platform,enables text-to-image, image editing, text-to-video, video-to-video and image-to-video creation powered by AI.
wan-ai.h1-description: Wan AI is an advanced and powerful visual generation model developed by Tongyi Lab. It can generate videos based on text, images and other control signals. The Wan 2.1 series models are now fully open-source.
wan-ai.h2-1-h3-1-description: Wan 2.1 consistently outperforms existing open-source models and state-of-the-art commercial solutions across multiple benchmarks.
wan-ai.h2-1-h3-2-description: The T2V-1.3B model requires only 8.19 GB VRAM, making it compatible with almost all consumer-grade GPUs. It can generate a 5-second 480P video on an RTX 4090 in about 4 minutes (without optimization techniques like quantization). Its performance is even comparable to some closed-source models.
wan-ai.h2-1-h3-3-description: Wan 2.1 excels in Text-to-Video, Image-to-Video, Video Editing, Text-to-Image, and Video-to-Audio, advancing the field of video generation.
wan-ai.h2-1-h3-4-description: Wan 2.1 is the first video model capable of generating both Chinese and English text, featuring robust text generation that enhances its practical applications.
wan-ai.h2-1-h3-5: Powerful Video VAE of Wan AI
wan-ai.h2-1-h3-5-description: Wan-VAE delivers exceptional efficiency and performance, encoding and decoding 1080P videos of any length while preserving temporal information, making it an ideal foundation for video and image generation.
wan-ai.h2-2-h3-1-description: Excels at generating realistic videos featuring extensive body movements, complex rotations, dynamic scene transitions, and fluid camera motions.
wan-ai.h2-2-h3-2-description: Generates videos that accurately simulate real-world physics and realistic object interactions.
wan-ai.h2-2-h3-3-description: Offers movie-like visuals with rich textures and a variety of stylized effects.
wan-ai.h2-2-h3-4-description: Features a universal editing model for precise edits using image or video references.
wan-ai.h2-2-h3-5: Visual Text Generation by Wan AI 2.1
wan-ai.h2-2-h3-5-description: Creates text and dynamic text effects in videos directly from text prompts.
wan-ai.h2-3-description: Through our product, you can seamlessly leverage our models with a user-friendly experience to access inspiring video content.
wan-ai.h2-4-description: In this repo, we release the code and weights for the Wan 2.1, a comprehensive and open suite of video foundation models designed to push the boundaries of video generation.
wan-ai.h2-4-h3-1-description: The I2V-14B model outperforms leading closed-source models as well as all existing open-source models, achieving SOTA performance. It is capable of generating videos that demonstrate complex visual scenes and motion patterns based on input text and images, including both 480P and 720P resolution models.
wan-ai.h2-4-h3-2-description: The T2V-14B model sets a new SOTA performance among both open-source and closed-source models, showcasing its ability to generate high-quality visuals with substantial motion dynamics. It is also the only video model capable of producing both Chinese and English text and supports video generation at both 480P and 720P resolutions.
wan-ai.h2-4-h3-3-description: The T2V-1.3B model supports video generation on almost all consumer-grade GPUs, requiring only 8.19 GB of BRAM to produce a 5-second 480P video, with an output time of just 4 minutes on an RTX 4090 GPU. Through pre-training and distillation processes, it surpasses larger open-source models and achieves performance even comparable to some advanced closed-source models.
wan-ai.h2-4-h3-4-description: Wan 2.1 First-Last-Frame-to-Video (FLF2V) is an AI-based video generation technology that synthesizes intermediate frames between a given start and end frame to produce smooth videos. It leverages a 14B-parameter model, supports multi-GPU accelerated inference, and offers pretrained checkpoints with a Gradio demo for interactive testing. Applications include video inpainting, animation production, and more.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-1: What is Wan 2.1 by Wan AI and how does it work?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-1-description: Wan 2.1 by Wan AI is Alibaba Cloud's state-of-the-art video generation model that transforms text descriptions into stunning, high-quality videos. Leveraging advanced technologies like Variational Autoencoders (VAE) and Diffusion Transformers (DiT), it ensures realistic visuals, smooth transitions, and accurate physics for a truly immersive experience.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-2: Do I need technical expertise to use Wan 2.1 by Wan AI?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-2-description: Wan 2.1 by Wan AI is designed with simplicity in mind. Its intuitive interface allows anyone to create professional-quality videos effortlessly, even without advanced technical skills. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, you'll find the platform easy to navigate and use.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-3: What types of videos can I create with Wan 2.1 by Wan AI?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-3-description: Wan 2.1 by Wan AI is versatile and capable of generating a wide range of video content. From dynamic scenes like dancing and sports to educational tutorials and historical video restoration, it empowers you to bring your creative vision to life.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-4: How long does it take to generate a video?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-4-description: The video generation time depends on the complexity and length of your project. For faster results, the Pro version offers accelerated processing speeds, making it ideal for time-sensitive tasks.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-5: Can I customize the video output?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-5-description: Absolutely! Wan 2.1 by Wan AI provides extensive customization options, allowing you to adjust resolution, frame rate, movement complexity, and more. Tailor your videos to meet your specific needs and preferences.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-6: What input formats does Wan 2.1 AI by Wan AI support for video generation?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-6-description: Wan 2.1 AI by Wan AI primarily supports text descriptions as input for video generation. You can provide detailed textual prompts describing the scene, actions, and desired visual effects. Additionally, it may support image inputs for enhanced context in future updates.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-7: Can Wan 2.1 AI by Wan AI generate videos in multiple languages?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-7-description: Yes, Wan 2.1 AI by Wan AI supports multilingual text inputs, allowing you to generate videos based on descriptions in various languages. However, the quality of output may vary depending on the language and the complexity of the description.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-8: Is there a limit to the length of videos that Wan 2.1 by Wan AI can generate?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-8-description: The length of generated videos depends on the subscription plan. The free version may have limitations on video duration, while the Pro version supports longer and more complex video generation. Specific limits can be found in the platform's documentation.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-9: How does Wan 2.1 by Wan AI ensure the quality of generated videos?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-9-description: Wan 2.1 AI by Wan AI leverages advanced technologies like Variational Autoencoders (VAE) and Diffusion Transformers (DiT) to ensure high-quality outputs. These technologies enable realistic visuals, smooth transitions, and accurate physics simulations.
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-10: How does Wan 2.1 by Wan AI handle complex scenes with multiple characters?
wan-ai.h2-5-h3-10-description: Wan 2.1 by Wan AI is designed to handle complex scenes with multiple characters by analyzing the relationships and interactions described in the text input. It uses advanced algorithms to ensure realistic positioning, movements, and interactions between characters.

prompt.title: How to write and debug AI prompts
prompt.description: We provide a powerful free prompt generator that helps users generate high-quality prompts, making it easier to use Wan AI and other AI video generation tools.

section1.title: How to use the prompt generator

basic.name: Basic mode (Basic Formula)
basic.target: New users trying AI video for the first time
basic.feature: Provides simple and easy-to-understand prompt templates, suitable for quick start

advanced.name: Advanced mode (Advanced Formula)
advanced.target: Users with some AI video generation experience
advanced.feature: Supports more complex prompt combinations, generating more creative videos
advanced.example: Future city, flying car, neon lights

camera.name: Camera movement mode (Camera Movement Formula)
camera.target: Users with specific camera movement requirements
camera.feature: Supports adding camera movement effects, such as panning, zooming, and rotating

transformation.name: Transformation mode (Transformation Formula)
transformation.target: Users who need to generate transformation effects
transformation.feature: Supports generating transformation effects of objects or scenes, such as gradual change and fusion

clearGoal.title: Clear goal
clearGoal.description: Before writing AI prompts, clearly define the video content you want to generate. The clearer your goal, the better the generated video will be.

simpleLanguage.title: Use simple language
simpleLanguage.description: AI prompts should be concise and clear, avoiding complex sentences.
simpleLanguage.badExample: Generate a video of children playing in the park in the afternoon.

keywordCombination.title: Keyword combination
keywordCombination.description: Combine multiple keywords to generate more diverse video content.

styleEmotion.title: Add style or emotion
styleEmotion.description: If you need a specific style or emotion, you can add related descriptions in the AI prompt.

stepByStep.title: Step by step
stepByStep.description: If the generated video is not satisfactory, you can adjust the AI prompt step by step.

testCombinations.title: Test different combinations
testCombinations.description: Try different keyword combinations to find the best effect.

reference.title: Reference template
reference.description: Reference our provided prompts and AI video templates, quick start.
